meanings.definition: The materials used to cushion and cover furniture.
meanings.sent1: The upholstery on the sofa is soft and comfortable.
meanings.sent2: She picked out a beautiful upholstery fabric for her new armchair.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought the upholstery on the couch was a giant chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The colorful upholstery of the chair added a pop of personality to the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the upholstery made the furniture look elegant and stylish.

meanings.definition: The craft or business of fitting furniture with padding, springs, webbing, and fabric or leather covers.
meanings.sent1: My aunt has been working in upholstery for over 20 years.
meanings.sent2: The upholstery shop down the street does excellent work on restoring old furniture.
meanings.sent3: The magician's new trick involved making a chair disappear under a piece of upholstery.
meanings.sent4: The upholstery expert transformed the worn-out sofa into a luxurious piece of furniture.
meanings.sent5: Learning upholstery requires patience and attention to detail to get the perfect finish.
